<line: 13> NANCY A. BERRYHILL.
<line: 14> Acting Commissioner of Social Security,.
<line: 15> )
<line: 16> Defendant.
<line: 17> )

[TEXT]
<line: 19> Upon stipulation and agreement of the parties, it is ORDERED that Defendant pay to
<line: 20> Plaintiff $5,500.00, in full satisfaction of any and all claims arising under the Equal Access to
<line: 21> Justice Act, 28 U.S.C.  2412. In addition, Plaintiff shall be compensated for the filing fee of
<line: 22> $400.00 from the Treasury Judgment Fund. If the award to Plaintiff is not subject to the Treasury
<line: 23> Offset Program, payment will be made by check payable to Plaintiff's counsel, George C.
<line: 24> Piemonte, of Martin, Jones and Piemonte and mailed to his office at 4601 Charlotte Park Drive,
<line: 25> Ste. 390, Charlotte, NC 28217, in accordance with Plaintiff's assignment to his attorney of his
<line: 26> right to payment of attorney's fees under the Equal Access to Justice Act.

[TEXT]
<line: 28> SO ORDERED this QZ
<line: 29>  day of May, 2019

[ABANDON]
<line: 31> JAMES C. DEVER III
<line: 32> UNITED STATES DISTRICT JUDGE
